item.title: CVE-2022-29884|2024-08-03T06:33:43.055Z -- siemens -- cp-8000%20master%20module%20with%20i%2Fo%20-25%2F%2B70%C2%B0c
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in CP-8000 MASTER MODULE WITH I/O -25/+70째C (All versions < CPC80 V16.30), CP-8000 MASTER MODULE WITH I/O -40/+70째C (All versions < CPC80 V16.30), CP-8021 MASTER MODULE (All versions < CPC80 V16.30), CP-8022 MASTER MODULE WITH GPRS (All versions < CPC80 V16.30). When using the HTTPS server under specific conditions, affected devices do not properly free resources. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to put the device into a denial of service condition.
